column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Henry was our waiter and he would be the only reason I would give the restaurant 5 stars. So the girls and I arrived at noon for a table
column3: which was fine. We were sat near the restrooms
column4: which are really clean. Henry came
column5: gave us detailed information about the menu and we ordered our food. Firstly
column6: $30 for a mimosa is highly priced. I would've been okay with $25 but that extra $5 came across steep. When our food arrived we expected bigger portions of food. Although the food was small it was delicious. Lastly when our bill came we were notified we couldn't split items on the bill
column7: we could just split the bill. This became inconvenient due to the fact I had the most expensive amount of food compared to others at the table.
